summary: Projekt zur Kartenverwaltung: UI-Anpassungen im Karten-Editor und Performance-Optimierungen beim Speichern/Verkaufen.
known_issues: Speichern nach Kartenbearbeitung dauert sehr lange.

existing_features.title: Remove the "Age" and "Version" input fields from the card edit dialog UI, and ensure editing a card no longer requires the user to enter or validate those fields.

Improve perceived performance for "Save" after editing a card by preventing the UI from waiting on multiple sequential React Query invalidations/refetches before closing the dialog and showing success feedback.

Improve perceived performance for "Sell" (mark card as sold) by preventing the UI from waiting on multiple sequential React Query invalidations/refetches before closing the dialog and showing success feedback.

new_feature_requests.summary: Im Karten-Editor die Eingabefelder „Version“ und „Alter“ entfernen.

projectName: Remove Age/Version inputs from card editor and speed up save/sell actions
